attributes.action: Let Plymouth Argyle continue using the Mayflower Terrace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been set up to get the recent decision to close the Mayflower Terrace at Home Park,Plymouth overturned.There is no viable reason why we cannot have the standing area for another season. Please for the sake of Plymouth Argyle and more so the sake of football, Sign the petition and show your support!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
